algorithm_technique: Backtracking with DFS to explore operator placements and operand combinations.
problem_summary_simple: Add operators (+, -, *) between digits to reach a target value.
problem_summary_technical: Backtracking DFS explores all valid operator placements, handling multi-digit numbers and operator precedence implicitly.
key_insights: The core idea is to explore all possible placements of operators.
Need to handle multi-digit numbers and avoid leading zeros.
The multiplication operator requires special handling due to precedence.
